weapons.name: Ani-Mines
weapons.function: Drops timed explosive projectiles in a ring that explode for large area damage.

weapons.name: Anti-Shark Sea Mine
weapons.function: Fires explosives that bounce between enemies.

weapons.name: Battle Bunny Crossbow
weapons.function: Fires a cone of projectiles scaling with bonus crit chance in a random direction. Projectiles pierce on critical strike.

weapons.name: Blade-o-rang
weapons.function: Fires returning projectiles at the nearest enemy.

weapons.name: Bunny Mega-Blast
weapons.function: Fires orbital strikes scaling with bonus critical chance at random enemies.

weapons.name: Cyclonic Slicers
weapons.function: Orbiting projectiles damage and knock back enemies.

weapons.name: Echoing Batblades
weapons.function: Fires piercing projectiles that bounce off terrain.

weapons.name: Final City Transit
weapons.function: Trains occasionally appear and drive through enemies.

weapons.name: Gatling Bunny-Guns
weapons.function: Deals area damage over time in a cone.

weapons.name: Iceblast Armor
weapons.function: Blocks damage and freezes surrounding enemies. damage scales with armor and maxHealth.

weapons.name: Lioness's Lament
weapons.function: Fires crescent shaped projectiles.

weapons.name: Paw Print Poisoner
weapons.function: Leaves a damaging poison cloud behind while moving.

weapons.name: Radiant Field
weapons.function: Damages nearby enemies, scaling with your maxHealth.

weapons.name: Searing Shortbow
weapons.function: Fires projectiles that create lingering fire areas for a duration.

weapons.name: Statikk Sword
weapons.function: Fires a lightning shock that bounces between enemies with the highest absolute current health.

weapons.name: T.I.B.B.E.R.S
weapons.function: Summons Robo-Tibbers. Robo-Tibbers swipes, dealing area damage. Robo-Tibbers focuses on enemies with the highest absolute current health.

weapons.name: The Annihilator
weapons.function: Summons a massive strike over the area after a delay which instantly kills all normal enemies and heavily damages Elite enemies.

weapons.name: UwU Blaster
weapons.function: Rapidly fires laser projectiles at the nearest enemy.

weapons.name: Vortex Glove
weapons.function: Fires a rotating stream of projectiles.

weapons.name: YuumiBot
weapons.function: Summons a Yuum.AI drone. Yuum.AI damages and knocks up enemies, and also gathers exp Orbs.
